# wy-cloud-files

## Properties

| Property        | Modifiers | Type               | Default |
|-----------------|-----------|--------------------|---------|
| `iframeVisible` |           | `boolean`          | false   |
| `origin`        | readonly  | `string`           |         |
| `showOverlay`   |           | `boolean`          | false   |
| `src`           |           | `URL \| undefined` |         |

## Methods

| Method  | Type       |
|---------|------------|
| `close` | `(): void` |
| `open`  | `(): void` |

## Events

| Event            | Type                                             |
|------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `external-blobs` | `CustomEvent<{ externalBlobs: ExternalBlobType[] \| null; }>` |
| `release-focus`  |                                                  |
